data.eml:eml: A new genus of Saucrosmylinae (Insecta, Neuroptera) from the Middle Jurassic of Daohugou, Inner Mongolia, China

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Liu, Qing, Zhang, Haichun, Wang, Bo, Fang, Yan, Zheng, Daran, Zhang, Qi (2013): A new genus of Saucrosmylinae (Insecta, Neuroptera) from the Middle Jurassic of Daohugou, Inner Mongolia, China. Zootaxa 3736 (4): 387-391, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3736.4.6
